item.title: 链码的访问控制(cid库)
item.description: Client Identity Chaincode Library（客户端标识链代码库） The client identity chaincode library enables you to write chaincode which makes access control decisions based on the identity of the client (i.e. the invoker of the chaincode). In particular, you may make access control decisions based on either or both of the following associated with the client: 客
